EmailTemplate.name: INTERNAL - December Associate Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners' December Associate Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Associate Newsletter December 2012
MBO's NEW Revamped Referral Program We are thrilled to announce that we have recently launched a brand new Referral Program with some serious perks! Our greatest compliment is when an Associate like you spreads the word about us to friends and colleagues that would benefit from utilizing our services. When you refer a friend, every referral you submit gives you a chance to win a home office makeover worth up to $5,000! You will also be giving your friend the opportunity to try us for free. Finally, if your friend likes what we do, we will deposit $500 into your Business Center upon their enrollment and subsequent client collected billings of $30,000. Learn More <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program>!
Outsource your Business Development We've got quite an exciting initiative in the works here at MBO Partners. We have heard from many of you about the importance of building and maintaining your project pipelines, and we have developed a solution to help you stay on top.
Coming this Spring 2013, MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/people/msaab/blog/2012/12/18/outsource-your-business-development> will reveal a place for Associates to evaluate and hire qualified business development professionals to help find new projects. As a busy consultant you have a lot going on keeping up with your clients, your profession and your marketing. Now you can engage a professional sales person if and when you need one. Your hired business development agent would be an MBO Associate with proven expertise in consulting sales within your specific industry. You would have two ways to engage your business development agent. Learn More <http://info.mbopartners.com/Connectors.html>. Looking for Some Workspace? Trying to impress important clients is not easy to do in your own living room, which is why MBO has teamed up with Liquidspace <http://bit.ly/MBOLiquidSpace> to offer you a great deal. LiquidSpace is an application that connects people seeking workspace with venues that have space to share. High-end business centers, hip startup co-working spaces, hotels, and private spaces are listed on their web site and in your mobile application. As a member of MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/docs/DOC-1062>, you will receive 20% off your first space - a great way to enhance your Independent work style! Contact lebert@mbopartners.com <mailto:lebert@mbopartners.com> for more details and the coupon code.
Check out our NEW Independent's Guide! Announced in a recent press release <http://www.mbopartners.com/news-events/new-%E2%80%9Cindependent%E2%80%99s-guide%E2%80%9D-helps-spur-business-growth-america%E2%80%99s-169-million-solo-professi>, MBO Partners is proud to share our new Independent’s Guide! This rich online library contains over 100 pages of downloadable guides, 30+ articles, templates and downloadable tools to help professionals plan, launch, succeed and grow their independent consultancy career. If you have a specific question or area of interest that is not currently covered in the Guide, please let your Business Manager know. Check out The Independent’s Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide> today, and don’t forget to email us <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> your feedback or testimonial! DID YOU KNOW? - Final Reminder: Please familiarize yourself with the MBO Partners Account Balance Carry Over Policy. Click Here > <http://info.mbopartners.com/YearEndBalanceInformation2012.html> - There were changes to the 401k contribution limits for 2013. The personal contribution limit for 401k increased $500 to $17,500 (the total allowable contribution limit increased $1,000 to $51,000). - The taxable earning cap for Social Security increased to $113,700. Both the personal side of Social Security (what is deducted from gross wages) and the business side (what is deducted from the Business Center) will be 6.2% effective Jan. 1, 2013, as the 4.2% personal withholding break is set expire Dec. 31, 2012. - MBO will process Payroll a day early for both the Christmas and New Years' Holiday. If you have any questions, please contact your Business Manager.
CEO CORNER Enjoy the Holidays without Losing your Contracts
As the conversations in your neighborhood turn to mistletoe and eggnog, you’ll inevitably hear people comparing vacation time. Some companies are generous, and some can be Scrooge-like.
However, as an independent, no one tells you when to vacation; you just have to figure it out. Your clients will be thinking about their own holiday stressors— they all have in-laws coming to town, too. However, they’ll still be expecting their deliverables when they return (contract documents aren’t known to celebrate any major holidays). More> <http://info.mbopartners.com/CEOCornerDecember2012.html> BOOK REVIEW Amy O'Donnell, VP Talent Management, Critiques "Drive"
I am always intrigued by the subject of motivation and what internally inspires us to achieve success. So when I came across Dan Pink’s latest book " Drive, The Surprising Truth About What Motivates Us," I decided to pick up a copy to catch up on the latest research.
The main premise is that today’s organizations have it all wrong when it comes to what motivates us. Most businesses operate under the belief that the key to motivation is providing tangible rewards, such as a cash bonus or a corner office. More > <http://info.mbopartners.com/BookReviewAmyODonnellDec2012.html>
MARKETING CORNER Calling all Associates: Be the Next To Share your Story
Volunteer to share your story of career independence on our Meet the Independents site <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html>!
If your state is not shaded on our map <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html>, you can be featured. We’d love to hear from Florida, Minnesota, Arizona or Mississippi. Email jmacdonell@mbopartners.com <mailto:jmacdonell@mbopartners.com> to volunteer. SPOTLIGHT ON SERVICE Get to Know business manager Natalie Gallagher
Get to know MBO Partners' Business Manager Natalie Gallagher, of Haymarket, VA, a graduate of James Madison University.
Assigned to the New York City Metro Region, Natalie enjoys working with associates from a variety of backgrounds and career fields. More > <http://info.mbopartners.com/SpotlightonServiceDec2012.html> IN THIS ISSUE: - NEW Referral Program - Business Development - Workspace Opportunity - Independent's Guide - Associate Spotlight - Marketing Corner - CEO Corner - Executive Book Review - Spotlight on Service ASSOCIATE SPOTLIGHT
Jon Marcy
MBO Associate Since 08/2010 Get to know Jon Marcy, an MBO Associate who works as an independent consultant for the US Navy supporting strategic planning for the transition of telephone service for over 600,000 sailors and civilians around the world. Read about what led Jon into the independent career path, and how he stays successful. Full Interview <http://info.mbopartners.com/AssociateSpotlightDec2012.html>
*Interested in being profiled for the next Associate Newsletter? Please contact msaab@mbopartners.com <mailto:msaab@mbopartners.com> for more details. EVENTS We had a great turnout at our last Networking reception, which took place in the Tysons Corner, VA area. We’d like to thank everyone that came out, and we invite you to check out the photos <https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10151312303169490.493802.55966509489&type=1> from the evening. Enjoy!
WEBINARS Disrupt Yourself: Four Rules for Reinventing Your Career in 2013
In this not-to-be-missed New Year's Webinar <http://info.mbopartners.com/Jan10WebDisrupt-Yourself.html>, author Whitney Johnson builds on her Harvard Business Review article Disrupt Yourself®, which applies the road-tested theory of disruptive innovation to the expert professional seeking to further succeed in solo professional consulting work. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/Jan10WebDisrupt-Yourself.html> to re-energize your career this year.
MBO IN THE NEWS - 5 Predictions for the future of Social Entrepreneurship <http://www.huffingtonpost.com/eli-malinsky/5-predictions-for-the-future-of-social-entrepreneurship_b_2214686.html> - How to Successfully Navigate an Independent Career <http://www.openforum.com/articles/5-pieces-of-advice-for-gen-ys-growing-independent-workforce/> - How to Thrive in an Era When All Jobs are Temporary <http://jobs.aol.com/articles/2012/10/11/how-to-thrive-in-an-era-when-all-jobs-are-temporary/>
RUN A CREDIT REPORT ON NEW CLIENTS Don't forget to take advantage of our partnership with Club Quarters, a line of full service hotels, primarily designed for the business traveler. Locations include NY, Washington DC, San Francisco, Chicago, and Boston, just to name a few. Members receive lower rates and priority reservations. To take advantage of this offer, contact lebert@mbopartners.com <mailto:lebert@mbopartners.com> for more information and the discount code.
